ISSUE.TITLE: Remove the triage priority field from feature requests & bug reports
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Remove the "triage priority" field from the GitHub issue templates for feature requests and bug reports. ### Justification This field was introduced a few months ago with the hope of expediting the assignment of new issues, however it appears to confuse many users.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #18379: Ensure RSS feed content within dashboard widget is sanitized

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18425: Remove the triage priority field from GitHub issue templates
